description:
It is a wonderful and practical piece of software, however, I use the Wayland windowing system which is not compatible with Nyrna. Requesting the dev to make it compatible with Wayland windowing system.

PS- Please add support for other OS too like Windows and Mac
summary: Please add more windowing systems to your app

description: Love this, I have used it on a few things so far, steam, suspending browsers. Didn't work trying to suspend a Kdenlive render tho even though it said it was suspended in the Nyrna app it continued on until it was complete & the window remained active.
